  • Uses of RandomIter in org.eclipse.imagen.iterator

    Subinterfaces of RandomIter in org.eclipse.imagen.iterator
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    WritableRandomIter
    An iterator that allows random read/write access to any sample within its bounding rectangle.
    Methods in org.eclipse.imagen.iterator that return RandomIter
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static RandomIter
    RandomIterFactory.create(Raster ras, Rectangle bounds)
    Constructs and returns an instance of RandomIter suitable for iterating over the given bounding rectangle within the given Raster source.
    static RandomIter
    RandomIterFactory.create(RenderedImage im, Rectangle bounds)
    Constructs and returns an instance of RandomIter suitable for iterating over the given bounding rectangle within the given RenderedImage source.

  • Uses of RandomIter in org.eclipse.imagen.media.iterators

    Classes in org.eclipse.imagen.media.iterators that implement RandomIter
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    RandomIterFallbackByte
    Slight modified version of ImageN RandomIterFallbackNoCacheNoArray that uses byte vectors to handle indexes rather than int vector.
    class 
    RandomIterFallbackByteNoCache
    Modified version of ImageN RandomIterFallbackByte that stores the tile positions in a byte array with less memory usage.
    class 
    RandomIterFallbackInt
    Slight modified version of ImageN RandomIterFallbackNoCacheNoArray that uses int vectors to handle indexes.
    class 
    RandomIterFallbackIntNoCache
    Modified version of ImageN RandomIterFallbackByte that stores the tile positions in a int array.
    class 
    RandomIterFallbackLarge
    Slight modified version of ImageN RandomIterFallbackNoCacheNoArray that uses byte vectors to handle indexes rather than int vector.
    class 
    RandomIterFallbackNoCacheNoArray
    Modified version of ImageN RandomIterFallbackIntNoCache that doesn't stores the tile positions in an array.
    class 
    RandomIterFallbackShort
    Slight modified version of ImageN RandomIterFallbackNoCacheNoArray that uses short vectors to handle indexes rather than int vector.
    class 
    RandomIterFallbackShortNoCache
    Modified version of ImageN RandomIterFallbackByte that stores the tile positions in a short array with less memory usage.
    Methods in org.eclipse.imagen.media.iterators that return RandomIter
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static RandomIter
    RandomIterFactory.create(Raster ras, Rectangle bounds, boolean cachedTiles, boolean arrayCalculation)
    Constructs and returns an instance of RandomIter suitable for iterating over the given bounding rectangle within the given Raster source.
    static RandomIter
    RandomIterFactory.create(RenderedImage im, Rectangle bounds, boolean cachedTiles, boolean arrayCalculation)
    Constructs and returns an instance of RandomIter suitable for iterating over the given bounding rectangle within the given RenderedImage source.

  • Uses of RandomIter in org.eclipse.imagen.media.iterators.nl

    Classes in org.eclipse.imagen.media.iterators.nl that implement RandomIter
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    RandomIterFallbackLocal
    Modified version of ImageN RandomIterFallbackNoCacheNoArray that uses a ThreadLocal object for storing the current tile used in iterations.
